name: Rinng Parts - Rear Hub only polished
description:
Now available for direct sale in the U.S.A !!

Rinng Parts hubs are the finest quality fixed gear freestyle hubs available on the market today . Handmade in Japan by very talented machinist and craftsmen .
With machine features that can be considered art by the simplest definition , these hubs are beautiful to say the least !

Features: 
Full double sealed bearings throughout 
Heat-treated Chromoly axle's 
Key'd driver for no slip / no fail fixed engagement 
Polished finish 
Available in 36" hole only

name: Rinng Parts - Titanium Rear axle / 7075 driver "hop up kit"
description:
Nemesis Project exclusive !
We worked with the guys at Rinng Parts to have these exclusive "hop up kit's" produced for their amazing hubs .
The Titanium rear axle is almost 1/2 the weight of the stock chromoly axle and proven to be stronger ! 
The 7075 rear driver is also lighter and just as strong as the stock unit .
The lightened driver combined with the titanium axle will make your Rinng hubs the lightest FGFS hubs available today .

Vapor bars

Width - 29in wide

name: Deathmobile DM-135
description:
The Deathmobile was built as the ultimate MTB DJ / hardtail "playbike" if you live at the park , pumptrack or Dirtjumps then this should be your bike ! 

The Deathmobile is one of our original MTB frame models recently brought back and improved with new features like a sluggo tapered double butted toptube , Mid BB , Tapered rear stays and 135 spaced rear drops intended for single speed MTB disk hubs. Ridden and tested by Nemesis Project MTB slopestyle pro Jorgen Jomne who swears by this new frames design !

Features :

Integrated headset 
Mid BB 
Tapered / double butted "Sluggo" toptube 
Double butted down tube 
Externally butted seattube 
Tapered rear stays 
Laser cut heattreated rear drops 
Built in seatclamp 
Built for 25.4mm seatpost

Geo: 
Headangle: 68.50
Seatangle: 72.0
Toptube: 22.50
Chainstays: 390mm

name: Sluggo V2 w/ integrated clamp 35cm
description:
Sluggo V2 w/ integrated seat post clamp 

The Sluggo V2 was developed to be the most advanced fixed Gear freestyle frame available today .
Now we have taken it one step further by designing a new CNC'd seattube that is internally relieved for a 25.4mm post as well as externally CNC machined to save weight. By removing the pivotal top and adding a built in clamp for riders who want the ability to adjust their seat post height . 
These frames also feature our "Sluggo" double butted / tapered top tube that resist denting in the center section. 

Features : 
Full double butted chromoly Nem-Tek "sluggo" tubeset 
Mid BB 
45x45 integrated head tube 
Gusset's at headtube / downtube 
Full CNC machined seat pillar w/ integrated pivotal top 
14mm heat-treated rear dropouts 
Optimized for current micro-drive gearing

GEO: 
Seattube - 35cm 
Seatpost dia. - 25.4mm 
Headtube angle - 73.50 
Seattube angle - *Proprietary 
Chainstay 382mm 
BB drop - Negative 
420mm axle to crown fork recommended

*proprietary angles have been left out to protect the innocent

options.name: O.D. Olive green , Military spec powdercoat

description:
YO Weezzy bars

These are the ever popular cross bar design made in Sacramento . 
Rise - 4.5in  
Width - 30in 
Up-sweep 5 degrees 
Backsweep 12 degrees 
Clamp dia. 22.2mm

Finish - Chrome

name: 2013 Steveland Cleaner
description:
Created in 2010 the Steveland Cleaner is now in it's 3rd year of production .
Released as the first dedicated 26" FGFS frame featuring 14mm drops and mid BB / integrated headset back in 2010.  Sure people laughed at us but look where things are now ! The Steveland Cleaner frame, set the standard of what the current FGFS frame should be long before the other guys knew what they wanted !!
For 2013 the Steveland Cleaner frame returns as the lightest production fixed gear freestyle frame produced !! 
At 4.5lbs the competition is lucky to get within a pound of this weight !!
Material strength is another story !

With the 100% Supertherm construction of the 2013 Steveland Cleaner you get the best frame we can produce.
TrueTemper's Supertherm tube set :
SUPERTHERM ™ is made from a proprietary superthermophilic (heat-loving) alloy. With an industry-leading strength of 217 KSI. These tubes will take a thrashing and come back for more. This is the ultimate material for high strength and low weight so you can go higher, faster, longer. 

Frame features include -
Mid BB 
Integrated headtube 
Heat treated , laser cut rear dropouts with 14mm axle slots for 120mm rear spacing . 
100% TrueTemper Supertherm construction 
double butted top / down tubes 
double butted seattube 
tapered and formed ( not bent ! ) chain and seatstays 
All tubes are made from TrueTemper supertherm alloy !!!

Geo:
Unchanged from the original prototype built in early 2010
73.50 Head angle 
74.0 Seattube angle 
378mm chainstay 
Negative BB drop 
designed around a 415-420mm axle to crown fork 


Available in RAW or Translucent RED , custom colors available for +$75
Please contact us with any questions .

name: GRNDLVL Fixed Gear freestyle frame 44cm
description:
The GRNDLVL is a solid fixed gear frame offering , originally contracted by a client with their head in the clouds and no money to pay for the contracted production run we were left with the frames .
These are hands down the finest FGFS frame offering on the market today. Tested and proven by the top riders in the sport , built from the best materials possible . This bike outshines anything close to it !!

Built from TrueTempers strongest tube set - Supertherm this bike will outlast even the toughest riders .
Offered in Raw / Powdercoat or triple dipped show Chrome !!

You cannot go wrong with these GRNDLVL frames. True Temper's Supertherm tubeset is legit. This frame is 100% made in the USA and thrashed by some of the top riders in FGFS. It’s available now (size small only – because that all we built).
“When we decided to make a GRNLVL FCE frame we knew two things must be true. It needed to be strong and it needed to be light. We have definitely achieved both of those goals with our FCE-1 frame.” - Some FGFS rider you prolly herd of.

Frame features :
TRUE TEMPER SUPERTHERM DOUBLE BUTTED FRONT TRIANGLE
TAPERED SUPERTHERM CHAINSTAYS
4130 STRAIGHT GAUGE SEATSTAYS
73.5º HEAD TUBE ANGLE
73.0 SEAT TUBE ANGLE
25.4MM SEAT TUBE
2.2 TIRE CLEARANCE
Available in Chrome , Raw or powdercoated gloss black

Distributor and Shop Wholesale pricing available , Please contact us with any questions .

name: Sluggo V2 38cm
description:
Sluggo V2 38cm Chrome $550

The Sluggo V2 was created to be the ultimate fixed gear freetyle bike . With its intigrated pivotal technology featuring a fully CNC machined one piece seat pillar , custom double butted tapered "Sluggo" toptube. 
These features put this bike years ahead of anything in it's class!

Features :
Full double butted chromoly Nem-Tek "sluggo" tubeset
Mid BB
45x45 integrated head tube 
Gusset's at headtube / downtube 
Full CNC machined seat pillar w/ integrated pivotal top  
14mm heat-treated rear dropouts
Optimized for current micro-drive gearing

GEO:
Seattube - 38cm 
Pivotal height - 440mm
Headtube angle - 73.50
Seattube angle - *Proprietary  
Chainstay 382mm
BB drop - Negative
420mm axle to crown fork recommended

name: Reaper 10mm hub pair 36hole Red anodize
description:
Reaper components 10mm hub pair 36hole Red anodize

Reaper is our components brand , this is our way of suppling our customers with the parts they need to assemble our frame sets into complete bikes .

Features : 
6061 main hub shell , 14mm heattreated 4130 chromoly center axle with 10mm female bolt system. 
2 precision sealed bearing's are set deeper into the hub shell to help avoid flex and prevent drag on the bearings to insure a smooth rolling hub under all types of riding conditions .

REAR HUB 
Spec's 
6061 aluminum hubshell 
14mm hollow center axle W/ 10mm heattreated 4130 FA bolts 
2 precision sealed bearing 
Red anodize finish

Spacing : 10mm x 120mm 
Drilling : 36 hole 
Flange dia : 60mm 
Color : Red Anodize

FRONT HUB 
Spec's 
6061 aluminum hubshell 
14mm hollow center axle W/ 10mm heattreated 4130 FA bolts 
2 precision sealed bearing 
Red anodize finish

Spacing : 10mm x 100mm 
Drilling : 36 hole 
Flange dia : 60mm 
Color : Red Anodize

* Product listed in IN-STOCK ready to ship the following day your order is received. No pre-orders , lead times or waiting on delivery!!

name: Nemesis Project Secret Agent 4x MTB frame gloss black
description:
Nemesis Project Secret Agent 4x MTB frame gloss black
The Secret Agent is the perfect do all aggressive MTB frame designed for street , park , dirt , trails or racing the Secret Agent does it all .
Made from 100% True-Temper Supertherm and 4130 chromoly this frame will outlast the zombie apocalypse.

Features :
Full TrueTemper 4130 tube set , TrueTemper supertherm seattube, top and downtubes . Ultra stiff box section chainstay , CNC machined rear dropouts w/engraved "nemesis" script , with integrated derailer hanger and disk mounts . CNC machine "euro" BB shell with ISCG tabs , CNC machined press-fit headtube with gussets on top and downtube junctures . 

Spec's 
Size: medium 
Color : Gloss black
Tubeset : TrueTemper - supertherm
Headtube : 1 1/8 pressfit 
Seatpost : 26.8mm 
Seatcollar : Stainless included*
Rear axle / spacing : 10mm x 135mm disk specific

Geo -
Toptube : 22.75"
Seattube : 12.5"
Headangle : 70'
Seatangle : 70'
Chainstay : 15.88"
Tire clearance : 2.35"

* Product listed in IN-STOCK ready to ship the following day your order is received. No pre-orders , lead times or waiting on delivery!!
